column2: "Na iyinom nye ntsɛmbusɛm a fa to hɔn enyim."
"Sɛ etɔ akowaa a ɔyɛ Hebriwnyi a
column3: mfe esia na ɔnsom: na dza otsia esuon no mu ɔmfa no ho ndzi nkɔ kwa."

column2: "Sɛ noara nko na ɔbae a
column3: noara nko nkɔ: sɛ ɔawar a
column4: ɔno ne yer nye no nkɔ."

column2: "Sɛ no wura ma no yer
column3: na ɔwo mbabanyin anaa mbabaa ma no a
column4: yer no nye ne mba nyɛ ɔbaa no no wura dze

column2: "Na sɛ akowaa no ka no petee dɛ
column3: Modɔ mo wura
column5: nye me mba; mennkɛfa moho edzi akɔ a:"

column2: "ɔno no wura no mfa no mbra Nyankopɔn enyim
column3: na ɔmfa no mbra ɔpon ho
column4: anaa ɔpon dua ho; na no wura no mfa fitsii mfitsi n’asomu; na ɔnsom no daa."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbanyin bi tɔn ne babaa ma ɔkɛyɛ afonabaa a
column3: ɔnodze mma ɔmmfa noho nndzi nnkɔ dɛ mbrɛ akowaa no yɛ."

column2: "Sɛ ɔnnsɔ no wura a noara ɔagye no ayewar no enyi a
column3: ɔnodze wɔmma wɔmbɔpon no: onnyi tum dɛ ɔtɔn no ma ɔnanaben bi

column2: "Na sɛ ɔgye no ayewar ma ne babanyin a
column3: ɔnyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze yɛ mbabaa."

column2: "Sɛ ɔgye yer fofor ma no a; mma onnkuw n’edziban
column3: n’akataho

column2: "Na sɛ ɔannyɛ iyinom ebiasa yi amma no a
column3: ɔnodze ɔmfa noho ndzi nkɔ kwa

column2: "Nyia ɔbɔ nyimpa ma owu no
column3: oku na wonku no."

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa annkɔ atsɛwee
column3: na Nyankopɔn na ɔama ne nsa apa dze a; ɔno mibeyi beebi mama wo na oeeguan akɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa bi ba ne nyɛnko do enyidaho mu dze ndaadaa ku no a; yi no fi m’afɔrmbukyia ho
column3: ma onwu."

column2: "Na nyia ɔbɔ n’egya
column3: anaa ne na no

column2: "Na nyia owia nyimpa
column3: na ɔtɔn no no
column4: anaa sɛ wohu no wɔ ne nsamu a

column2: "Na nyia ɔdom n’egya
column3: anaa ne na no

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa bi woridzi aper
column3: na kor bɔ kor no ɔbo
column6: na ɔka no to ne mpa do a:"

column2: "sɛ ɔsoɛr bio
column3: na osuo no poma mu nantsew fir edzi a
column4: ɔnodze nyia ɔbɔɔ no no no ho nyɛ no tɔtrɔtɔ: ne mber a asɛɛ no nko na ontua kaw
column5: na ɔmma wɔnsa no yarba koraa."

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa bobɔ n’akowaa
column3: anaa n’afonabaa abaa
column4: ma owu ne nsaano a; ɔno wondzi no wer."

column2: "Naaso sɛ ɔtsena hɔ da kor anaa nda ebien a
column3: mma wonndzi no wer: osiandɛ ɔyɛ ne sika."

column2: "Na sɛ mbanyin roko
column3: na wopira onyinsemfo
column5: na mbusu bi ammba ekyir dze a: brabo na wɔngye no
column6: dɛ mbrɛ ɔbaa no no kun dze bɔto no do no; na ontua no dɛ mbrɛ ntsɛmbuafo no bɛkyerɛ no."

column2: "Na sɛ mbusu bi ba ekyir a
column3: ɔnodze fa nkwa hyɛ nkwa ananmu

column2: "hyehyew hyɛ hyehyew ananmu
column3: ɔkam hyɛ ɔkam ananmu

column2: "Na sɛ obi bɔ n’akowaa enyiwa
column3: anaa n’afonabaa enyiwa na ɔsɛɛ no a
column4: n’enyiwa no ntsi ɔmma ɔmfa noho ndzi nkɔ."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbɔ n’akowaa ne se tu no
column3: anaa n’afonabaa ne se a; ne se no ntsi ɔmma ɔmfa noho ndzi nkɔ."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔnantwi sɛ ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa
column3: ma owu a
column4: ɔno ɔnantwi no wonsiw no abo
column5: na mma wonndzi ne nam; na ɔnantwi no wura dze wongyaa no."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔnantwi no ɔtɔ sesɛ dada na wɔama no wura atse
column3: na oennsie no fie
column4: na oekoku ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa dze a; ɔnantwi no wonsiw no abo
column5: na no wura no so wonku no."

column2: "Sɛ wɔbɛgye no mpata a
column3: ɔno ɔmma adze biara a wɔbɛgye no no mfa ntɔ no nkwa."

column2: "Sɛ ɔbabanyin na ɔasɛ no o
column3: ɔbabaa na ɔasɛ no o
column4: atsɛmbu yi ara na wɔmfa mbu no."

column2: "Sɛ ɔnantwi no sɛ akowaa anaa afonabaa a; ɔno ɔmma hɔn wura dwetɛ dwetɛbona eduasa
column3: na wonsiw ɔnantwi no abo."

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa bi kobue amona do
column3: anaa sɛ nyimpa bi kotu amona na ɔannkata do
column4: na ɔnantwi anaa asoaso kɔhwe mu a
column6: "ma no wura no nhyɛ ananmu; ɔmfa sika mma hɔn wura no

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa kor bi ne nantwi pira kor nedze ma owu a; ɔno wɔntɔn nantwi nyikan no
column3: na wɔnkyɛ ne tsiadze no; na fun no so wɔnkyɛ."

column2: "Mbom sɛ wonyim dɛ ɔnantwi no ɔtɔ sesɛ dada
column3: na no wura no ammfa no ennsie fie a; ɔno ɔmfa ɔnantwi nhyɛ ɔnantwi ananmu
column4: na abowafun no nyɛ noara nedze."
